The event did not involve: demonic teachings" or anything sexually explicit. Xochi Mochi read Todd Parr's children's book "It's Okay to be Different" to the children.
The widely: shared photo of the event is authentic, confirming that Xochi Mochi participated in Drag Queen Story Hour at Long Beach public library in October 2017.
Right: wing websites reported the event with a significant degree of alarm, using sensationalist language and false claims to create controversy.
The Drag Queen Story Hour project: of which this event was a part, aims to provide positive and diverse role models for children, challenging rigid gender restrictions and promoting inclusivity.
